name: 竜峰
message: "Make yourself at home."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Thanks."
He sets a white teacup on the black table in front of me.
It's filled with a pale amber liquid. Flower petals drift on the surface, and a curious fragrance rises from the cup.

name: 竜峰
message: "Smells great, right? I had to order it special. They don't sell it in Japan."
I take a sip. A florid aroma fills my nose. In the cup, the petals dance like blossoms on the wind.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...It's good."

name: 竜峰
message: "Glad you like it."
Ryuuhou sits down across from me, holding a teacup of his own.
He's looking right at me, smiling. I have to look away.
A few minutes ago, he led me through the club to his home. The second floor of the building had a tattoo parlor, and the third floor had apartments for the staff.
Ryuuhou lives in one of those. Like its occupant, the apartment doesn't fit into any mold I know of.
It's a traditional Japanese room with straw mats, but the decor is a mix of East and West. A lot of the furniture looks like European antiques.
I also notice tattoo designs pinned up around the room.
In the dim light, they look almost like charms at a shrine. It's a little eerie.

name: 蒼葉
message: "All these designs... Are you..."

name: 竜峰
message: "A tattoo artist? Yup."
That must be why the room smells vaguely of ink.
A tattoo artist... Just like Mizuki...
The memory brings an echo of pain.
...Huh?
That design...<K> I feel like I've seen it before.

name: 竜峰
message: "You interested in tattoos?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Oh, uh, kinda... but not enough to actually get one."

name: 竜峰
message: "You were staring, so I thought maybe... If you're ever in the mood, I'd be more than happy to ink you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, I couldn't... Actually..."

name: 竜峰
message: "Hm?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why are you doing this? Being so nice to me and all?"
I decide to go out on a limb and ask.
Ryuuhou looks up at the ceiling, as if considering his answer.

name: 竜峰
message: "You caught my attention the moment I saw you. I guess you could say it was love at first sight."

name: 竜峰
message: "Just kidding."
He smiles as I struggle for a reply, then flicks the handle of his teacup with a finger.

name: 竜峰
message: "This'll sound pretty shady, but honestly, it's because I sensed you were special."

name: 竜峰
message: "I'm serious this time. The moment I saw you, I sensed some kind of power... like an aura... emanating from you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Okay."
Is he gonna ask me to join a cult?
But Ryuuhou looks dead serious as he continues.

name: 竜峰
message: "There are forces inside you. Forces of reason, self-defense... destruction."

name: 竜峰
message: "And each has a will of its own. They're at war."
A force of destruction. That's what Granny called my power.
Does this guy... know something?
The cheer has vanished from Ryuuhou's eyes. He's gazing at me intently now.
I look at the floor and bring the cup to my lips so he won't notice how agitated I am.
The warm tea helps to calm my nerves.

name: 竜峰
message: "Hit the nail on the head, huh?"

name: 竜峰
message: "There's one thing I want you to understand. I'm not interested in explaining what makes you tick. That's for left brain types."

name: 竜峰
message: "I like things complex. Messy. Twisted. Way better than having things neat and tidy. It's the same with tattoos."
Ryuuhou lets his gaze roam lovingly across the designs on the walls.

name: 竜峰
message: "These probably look like doodles to you, but I assure you, every line is calculated."

name: 竜峰
message: "The catch and slide of the needle, the stretch and snap of the skin, the bleed and dry of the ink. You have to consider it all."

name: 竜峰
message: "Skin isn't a flat, smooth surface, you know. It's easy to see that, when it's stained with blood."

name: 竜峰
message: "And sometimes, things deviate from all my careful plans. There isn't a single spot on the human body that you can call perfect."

name: 竜峰
message: "That's why, when I ink someone, I do it with my soul."

name: 竜峰
message: "You're adding new layers, new distortions, to what's already there. You have to show respect, even when you've done this as long as I have."
He finishes by giving me a meaningful stare.
Man...
After hearing all that, I'm starting to realize why this guy makes me feel so uneasy.
I've always had the impression that he was putting on a performance, but when he talks about tattoos, that impression falls away.
The passion in his eyes and his voice. The obsession. That was real.
Though his words were the furthest thing from normal, Ryuuhou looked truly happy.
If that's how he feels about tattoos... what does he see when he looks at other human beings?
Suddenly, my eyelids grow heavy. My vision blurs. What...?

name: 竜峰
message: "I really am interested in you."
Ryuuhou's words seem to expand in my ears, then melt away.
I can't... keep my eyes open...

name: 竜峰
message: "As long as the forces inside of you clash, they will tear apart the bonds you've so carefully woven."

name: 竜峰
message: "That is your destiny, after all. You can never truly be with another."
My... destiny?
My thoughts are fading into oblivion.

Oh... I get it.
The tea...

name: 竜峰
message: "You, and my life's work. My ultimate tattoo. I wonder what sort of distortion combining the two will create. ...You'll show me, won't you?"
By the time I realize what's happening, it's too late.
I'm powerless to do anything... but let the darkness take me.
